mapper.insert: insert into company(company_id, company_name, company_location, register_time, update_time) value (#{company.id}, #{company.companyName}, #{company.companyLocation}, now(), now())
mapper.update: update company set (company_name = #{company.companyName}, company_location = #{company.companyLocation}, update_time = now()) where company_id = {company.id}
mapper.select: select * from company where company_name like "%"#{companyName}"%"
